title: (x) Tall & tidy sans on Circus Company Club poster - Garage Gothic {Stefan Callert}
content:
seen this one a bunch... but have never known it’s name??

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014190759/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_98.png) | 118.86 KB |

 [‹ looking for this α (alpha) symbol face.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014190759/http:/typophile.com/node/48891 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sony Vaio Logo Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014190759/http:/typophile.com/node/48888 "Go to next forum topic")
author: petterdeer

comments.content:
Hi there, it seems to be Garage Gothic!  
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/GarageGothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014190759/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/GarageGothic "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/GarageGothic")

Good work Stefan. Welcome to the Type ID Board!

- Mike Yanega
